name: Monke Nana
description:
Monke Nana is a 3D platformer, you climb ladders, grab banana geese, and sacrifice yourself to your banana god. Some would consider this game a 10/10 masterpiece, here are some reviews to prove it:

"playable"- parker

"such a game, much experience, wow" - Cj

"I went into this game a lost broken soul. When I played Monky nana I had found myself I had found my purpose in life. This game has changed my life for the better and I will be from now and going forward a better person and a complete person" - Charlie 

"inch resting" - Gym Brody

quotes that inspired  the game:

“There is always something more to learn. Even for a master.” – Master Oogway

“Use your skills for good, young warrior. Find the one thing you were denied so long ago — compassion.” – Master Oogway

"skeebildy bibble bop" - Sun Tzu probably
